title: Broken Sigil
description: There are houses like this all over the world. Most people only know of them from whispered stories over campfires; tall tales told to scare the unwary. But some...those who suffer...know better. They are drawn to these places to ease their pain.  If you have the will, the fortitude, you can peer into another life, where the dead are not gone.
author: William Meikle
